problem_text_cn: 如图△ABC中,AF平分∠BAC,F是BC上的一点,且BF=2CF,AC=1,则AB=()
problem_text_en: As shown in △ABC, AF bisects ∠BAC, F is a point on BC, and BF = 2 CF, AC = N_0, then AB = ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AF平分△ABC的∠BAC交BC于F,∴∠BAF=∠CAF,∵FE∥AC交AB于E,∴∠CAF=∠AFE,∴∠EAF=∠EFA,∴AE=FE,∵FE∥AC交AB于E,ED∥BC交AC于D∴四边形EFCD为平行四边形,∴AE=EF=DC,∵FE∥AC交AB于E,BF=2CF,AC=1,∴\frac{BE}{AE}=\frac{BF}{CF}=\frac{2}{1},\frac{AE}{AB}=\frac{AD}{AC},解得AE=\frac{1}{3},∴AB=1,故选:A．
